dataquery.name: WorkingQueue
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT W.WARRANT_ID AS 'WarrantID' FROM ACM_FACTS_CASE FC INNER JOIN AICMS_LOCATION L ON FC.LOCATION_ID = L.LOCATION_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PARTY PT ON PT.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = PT.PERSON_ALIAS_ID INNER JOIN ACM_WARRANT W on W.PARTY_ID = PT.PARTY_ID WHERE FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG = 'N' AND PT.SEALED_PARTY_FLG = 'N' AND P.SEALED_FLAG = 'N' AND PT.VOID = 'N' AND FC.VOID = 'N' AND FC.EXPUNGE_FLG = 'N' AND W.ISACTIVE = 'Y'

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT FC.CASE_ID AS 'CaseID' ,FC.CASE_NUMBER AS 'CaseNumber' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), FC.CASE_FILING_DT , 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), FC.CASE_FILING_DT , 101), '|') END AS 'CaseFilingDate' ,L.LOCATION_DESC AS 'LocationDesc' ,FC.DATE_TIME_MOD AS 'DateModified' ,W.WARRANT_ID AS 'WarrantID' FROM ACM_FACTS_CASE FC INNER JOIN AICMS_LOCATION L ON FC.LOCATION_ID = L.LOCATION_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PARTY PT ON PT.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = PT.PERSON_ALIAS_ID INNER JOIN ACM_WARRANT W on W.PARTY_ID = PT.PARTY_ID WHERE FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG = 'N' AND PT.SEALED_PARTY_FLG = 'N' AND P.SEALED_FLAG = 'N' AND PT.VOID = 'N' AND FC.VOID = 'N' AND FC.EXPUNGE_FLG = 'N' AND W.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND W.WARRANT_ID IN (?) ORDER BY FC.DATE_TIME_MOD DESC

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT A.CASE_ID AS 'CaseID' ,CASE WHEN A.COMPLAINT_NUM = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(A.COMPLAINT_NUM, '|') END AS 'ComplaintNum' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), B.CASE_FILING_DT, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), B.CASE_FILING_DT, 101), '|') END AS 'CitationDate' ,CASE WHEN E.DESCR = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(E.DESCR, '|') END AS 'VehicleMake' ,CASE WHEN F.DESCR = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(F.DESCR, '|') END AS 'VehicleModel' ,CASE WHEN G.VEH_COLOR_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(G.VEH_COLOR_DESC, '|') END AS 'VehicleColor' ,ISNULL((SELECT TOP 1 DL.LICENSE_NUM FROM ACM_DRIVERSLICENSE DL WHERE DL.PERSON_ALIAS_ID=C.PERSON_ALIAS_ID), '|') AS 'LicenseNumber' --,CASE WHEN DL.LICENSE_NUM = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(DL.LICENSE_NUM, '|') END AS 'LicenseNumber' ,ISNULL((SELECT TOP 1 STATE_NAME FROM ACM_STATE S INNER JOIN ACM_DRIVERSLICENSE DL ON S.STATE_ID = DL.STATE_ID WHERE DL.PERSON_ALIAS_ID=C.PERSON_ALIAS_ID), '|') AS 'DLState' --,CASE WHEN (SELECT TOP 1 STATE_NAME FROM ACM_STATE WHERE STATE_ID = DL.STATE_ID) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL((SELECT TOP 1 STATE_NAME FROM ACM_STATE WHERE STATE_ID = DL.STATE_ID), '|') END AS 'DLState' FROM ACM_CITATION A
INNER JOIN ACM_FACTS_CASE B ON A.CASE_ID = B.CASE_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PARTY C ON B.CASE_ID = C.CASE_ID left JOIN ACM_VEHICLEINFO D ON D.OWNER_PERSON_ALIAS_ID = C.PERSON_ALIAS_ID
LEFT JOIN ACM_DRIVERSLICENSE DL ON DL.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = D.OWNER_PERSON_ALIAS_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_VEHICLE_MAKE_TYP E ON D.VEHICLE_MAKE_TYP_ID = E.VEHICLE_MAKE_TYP_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_VEHICLE_MODEL_TYP F ON D.VEHICLE_MODEL_TYP_ID = F.VEHICLE_MODEL_TYP_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_VEH_COLOR G ON D.COLOR_ID = G.ID WHERE A.CASE_ID IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ETC.CASE_ID AS 'CaseID' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), EE.FILING_DT, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), EE.FILING_DT, 101), '|') END AS 'DateStamped' ,'' AS 'ROAName' ,EE.EVENT_ENTRY_DESC AS 'ROADescription' ,'' AS 'ROAComment' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), EE.SATISFIED_DATE, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), EE.SATISFIED_DATE, 101), '|') END AS 'SatisfiedDate' ,EE.EVENT_ENTRY_TYP_ID AS 'Event' FROM ACM_EVENT_ENTRY EE INNER JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_CASE ETC ON EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = ETC.EVENT_ENTRY_ID WHERE CASE_ID IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT FC.CASE_ID AS 'CaseID' ,PT.PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' ,CASE WHEN P.DISPLAYNAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(P.DISPLAYNAME, '|') END AS 'DisplayName' ,CASE WHEN (SELECT PARTY_ROLE_DESC FROM ACM_PARTY_ROLE_TYP WHERE PARTY_ROLE_TYP_ID = PT.PARTY_ROLE_TYP_ID) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL((SELECT PARTY_ROLE_DESC FROM ACM_PARTY_ROLE_TYP WHERE PARTY_ROLE_TYP_ID = PT.PARTY_ROLE_TYP_ID), '|') END AS 'PartyRole' FROM ACM_FACTS_CASE FC INNER JOIN ACM_PARTY PT ON PT.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PERSON P ON PT.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID WHERE FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG = 'N' AND FC.VOID = 'N' AND PT.SEALED_PARTY_FLG = 'N' AND P.SEALED_FLAG = 'N' AND PT.VOID = 'N' AND FC.EXPUNGE_FLG = 'N' AND FC.CASE_ID IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT PT.PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' ,CASE WHEN PC.HEIGHT = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(PC.HEIGHT, '0') END AS 'Height' ,CASE WHEN PC.WEIGHT = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(PC.WEIGHT, '0') END AS 'Weight' ,CASE WHEN PC.RACE_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PC.RACE_DESC, '|') END AS 'Race' ,CASE WHEN PC.HAIR_COLOR_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PC.HAIR_COLOR_DESC, '|') END AS 'HairColor' ,CASE WHEN PC.EYE_COLOR_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PC.EYE_COLOR_DESC, '|') END AS 'EyeColor' ,CASE WHEN PC.BRANCH_NAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PC.BRANCH_NAME, '|') END AS 'MilitaryBranch' ,CASE WHEN PC.COMMENT_TEXT = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PC.COMMENT_TEXT, '|') END AS 'DemographicComment' ,CASE WHEN SEX = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SEX, '|') END AS 'Sex' ,CASE WHEN PC.PROFESSION_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PC.PROFESSION_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'Profession' ,CASE WHEN SSN = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SSN, '|') END AS 'SSN' ,CASE WHEN PC.ETHNICITY_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PC.ETHNICITY_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'Ethnicity' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), DOB, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), DOB, 101), '|') END AS 'DOB' ,CASE WHEN CURRENT_FLAG = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CURRENT_FLAG, '|') END AS 'Current' ,CASE WHEN PRIMARY_FLG = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PRIMARY_FLG, '|') END AS 'Primary' ,CASE WHEN ENGLISH_FLUENCY = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ENGLISH_FLUENCY, '|') END AS 'EnglishFluency' ,CASE WHEN SKIN_STONE_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SKIN_STONE_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'SkinTone' ,CASE WHEN PHYSIQUE_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PHYSIQUE_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'Physique' ,CASE WHEN FACIAL_HAIR_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(FACIAL_HAIR_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'FacialHair' ,CASE WHEN GLASSES_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(GLASSES_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'Glasses' ,CASE WHEN SPEECH_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SPEECH_DESC, '|') END AS 'Speech' ,CASE WHEN CITIZENSHIP_COUNTRY = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CITIZENSHIP_COUNTRY, '|') END AS 'CitizenshipCountry' ,CASE WHEN DISPLAYNAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(DISPLAYNAME, '|') END AS 'DemographicsName' FROM SW_ACM_V_PHYSICAL_CHARS PC INNER JOIN ACM_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID=PC.PERSON_ALIAS_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PARTY PT ON PT.PERSON_ALIAS_ID=P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID WHERE PARTY_ID IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT PT.PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' ,CASE WHEN AD.ADDRESS_LINE1_TXT = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AD.ADDRESS_LINE1_TXT, '|') END AS 'AddressLine1' ,CASE WHEN AD.ADDRESS_LINE2_TXT = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AD.ADDRESS_LINE2_TXT, '|') END AS 'AddressLine2' ,CASE WHEN AD.MAILING_FLAG = '' THEN 'N' ELSE ISNULL(AD.MAILING_FLAG, 'N') END AS 'Mailing' ,CASE WHEN AD.COMMENT_TEXT = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AD.COMMENT_TEXT, '|') END AS 'AddressComment' ,CASE WHEN AD.POSTAL_CD = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AD.POSTAL_CD, '|') END AS 'Zip' ,CASE WHEN AD.STATE_NAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AD.STATE_NAME, '|') END AS 'State' ,CASE WHEN AD.ADDRESS_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AD.ADDRESS_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'AddressType' ,CASE WHEN AD.CITY_NAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AD.CITY_NAME, '|') END AS 'City' ,CASE WHEN POSTAL_CD_EXT = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(POSTAL_CD_EXT, '|') END AS 'ZipExt' ,CASE WHEN AD.COUNTY_NAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AD.COUNTY_NAME, '|') END AS 'County' ,CASE WHEN CURRENT_FLAG = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CURRENT_FLAG, '|') END AS 'CurrentAddress' ,CASE WHEN CURR_ADDRS_DURATION = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CURR_ADDRS_DURATION, '|') END AS 'CurrentAddressDuration' --,CASE WHEN HOUSING_TYPE = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(HOUSING_TYPE, '|') END AS 'HousingType' ,CASE WHEN ADDRS_REASON = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ADDRS_REASON, '|') END AS 'AddressReason' ,CASE WHEN DISPLAYNAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(DISPLAYNAME, '|') END AS 'AddressName' FROM SW_ACM_V_ADDRESS AD INNER JOIN ACM_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID=AD.PERSON_ALIAS_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PARTY PT ON PT.PERSON_ALIAS_ID=P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID WHERE PT.PARTY_ID IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT PT.PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' ,CASE WHEN (SELECT PHONE_TYP_DESC FROM ACM_PHONE_TYP WHERE PHONE_TYP_ID=PHS.PHONE_TYP_ID) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL((SELECT PHONE_TYP_DESC FROM ACM_PHONE_TYP WHERE PHONE_TYP_ID=PHS.PHONE_TYP_ID), '|') END AS 'PhoneType' ,CASE WHEN PHS.PHONE_PREFIX_NUM = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PHS.PHONE_PREFIX_NUM, '|') END AS 'Prefix' ,CASE WHEN PHS.BASE_PHONE_NUM = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PHS.BASE_PHONE_NUM, '|') END AS 'PhoneNumber' ,CASE WHEN PHS.EXTENSION_NUM = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PHS.EXTENSION_NUM, '|') END AS 'Extension' ,CASE WHEN PHS.CURRENT_FLAG = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PHS.CURRENT_FLAG, '|') END AS 'PhoneCurrent' ,CASE WHEN PHS.COMMENT_TEXT = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PHS.COMMENT_TEXT, '|') END AS 'PhoneComment' ,CASE WHEN DISPLAYNAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(DISPLAYNAME, '|') END AS 'PhoneName' FROM ACM_PHONE_SERVICE PHS INNER JOIN ACM_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID=PHS.PERSON_ALIAS_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PARTY PT ON PT.PERSON_ALIAS_ID=P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID WHERE PT.PARTY_ID IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT C.PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' ,CASE WHEN C.CHARGE_COUNT = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.CHARGE_COUNT, '0') END AS 'ChargeCount' ,CASE WHEN C.CHARGE_SEQ = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.CHARGE_SEQ, '0') END AS 'ChargeSequence' ,CASE WHEN C.OFFENSE_REF_NUM = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.OFFENSE_REF_NUM, '|') END AS 'ChargeCode' ,CASE WHEN C.OFFENSE_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.OFFENSE_DESC, '|') END AS 'ChargeDescription' ,CASE WHEN C.OFFENSE_CLASS_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.OFFENSE_CLASS_DESC, '|') END AS 'ChargeClass' ,CASE WHEN C.OFFENSE_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.OFFENSE_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'ChargeType' ,CASE WHEN C.FILED_JURISDICTION_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.FILED_JURISDICTION_DESC, '|') END AS 'Jurisdiction' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), C.OFFENSE_DT_FRM, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), C.OFFENSE_DT_FRM, 101), '|') END AS 'OffenseDateFrom' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), C.OFFENSE_DT_TO, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), C.OFFENSE_DT_TO, 101), '|') END AS 'OffenseDateTo' ,CASE WHEN C.DISPLAYNAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.DISPLAYNAME, '|') END AS 'ChargeName' ,CASE WHEN C.DISPOSITION_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(C.DISPOSITION_DESC, '|') END AS 'Disposition' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), C.DISPOSITION_DT, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), C.DISPOSITION_DT, 101), '|') END AS 'DispositionDate' FROM AZGJ_ACM_V_GCI_CHARGES C WHERE PARTY_ID IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT A.PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(20), A.TOTAL_BALANCE) = '' THEN '0.00' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(20), A.TOTAL_BALANCE), '0.00') END AS 'TotalBalance' ,CASE WHEN A.DISPLAYNAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(A.DISPLAYNAME, '|') END AS 'AccountingName' FROM AZGJ_ACM_V_GCI_ACCOUNTING A WHERE A.PARTY_ID IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT W.PARTY_ID AS 'PartyID' ,CASE WHEN P.DISPLAYNAME = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(P.DISPLAYNAME, '|') END AS 'WarrantName' ,CASE WHEN FC.CASE_NUMBER = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(FC.CASE_NUMBER, '|') END AS 'WarrantCaseNumber' ,CASE WHEN WT.WARRANT_TYP_DESC = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(WT.WARRANT_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'WarrantType' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), W.ISSUE_DT, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), W.ISSUE_DT, 101), '|') END AS 'IssuedDate' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), W.QUASHED_DATE, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), W.QUASHED_DATE, 101), '|') END AS 'QuashedDate' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), W.RETURN_DATE, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), W.RETURN_DATE, 101), '|') END AS 'ReturnDate' ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar(10), W.SERVED_DT, 101) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10), W.SERVED_DT, 101), '|') END AS 'ServedDate' ,CASE WHEN W.WARRANT_ID = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(W.WARRANT_ID, '|') END AS 'WarrantID' ,CJ.JUDGE_CD AS 'JudgeCode' ,ISNULL((select DISPLAYNAME from ACM_PERSON where PERSON_ALIAS_ID = (select PERSON_ALIAS_ID from ACM_JUDGE where JUDGE_CD = CJ.JUDGE_CD)), '|') AS 'JudgeName' FROM ACM_WARRANT W LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_WARRANT_TYP WT ON W.WARRANT_TYP_ID = WT.WARRANT_TYP_ID INNER JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_WARRANT EW ON W.WARRANT_ID = EW.WARRANT_ID INNER JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENTRY EE ON EW.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID AND ISNULL(EE.VOID,'N') = 'N' INNER JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_PARTY EP ON EW.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = EP.EVENT_ENTRY_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PARTY PR ON EP.PARTY_ID = PR.PARTY_ID INNER JOIN ACM_PERSON P ON PR.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID INNER JOIN ACM_EVENT_TO_CASE EC ON PR.CASE_ID = EC.CASE_ID AND EW.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = EC.EVENT_ENTRY_ID INNER JOIN ACM_FACTS_CASE FC ON EC.CASE_ID = FC.CASE_ID AND ISNULL(FC.VOID,'N') = 'N' LEFT JOIN ACM_CASE_JUDGE CJ ON FC.CASE_ID = CJ.CASE_ID WHERE W.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND PR.PARTY_ID IN (?)
